long_description: The Geomate Geocaching Nano cache container is so diminutive it can be hidden in plain sight-perfect for crowded urban environments! Built-in magnet makes the Nano easy to hide in a wide variety of locations. Waterproof gasket helps protect contents from moisture. Container holds two 14 x 0.25 in. log scrolls. The Geomate Geocaching Nano cache container can be repainted to blend in with its surroundings.
short_description: The Geomate Geocaching Nano cache container is so diminutive it can be hidden in plain sight-perfect for crowded urban environments!
